room_title: Escape room "Legends of a Hidden Temple" by LI Escape Game in New York
room_description:
You and your fellow archaeologists travel around the world searching for lost artifacts and infiltrate dangerous tombs and ruins. Your mentor, Professor Rosely, went on a dangerous mission in search of an ancient lost ruby, and mysteriously disappeared.
You have located his dig site outside of the temple's entrance, but so excited to enter, you fall into the tomb's quicksand trap set by the ancient temple guards. Find your way out of the quicksand, crack the codes to get into the temple, make your way through the walls of despair, and through the grotto.
